verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] started the trade war anew with fresh announcements of steel and aluminum tariffs that prompted swift threats of retaliation from key allies .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: started] [ARG1: the trade war] [ARGM-MNR: anew] [ARGM-MNR: with fresh announcements of steel and aluminum tariffs that prompted swift threats of retaliation from key allies] .

President Donald Trump has started the trade war anew with [ARG0: fresh announcements of steel and aluminum tariffs] [R-ARG0: that] [V: prompted] [ARG1: swift threats of retaliation from key allies] .
